text: aqgnayE# pathiqkRutE# purOqDASa#-maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqdyO da#r.SapUrNamAsayAqjI sanna#mAvAqsyA$M ~MvA paurNamAqsIM ~MvA#&tipAqdayE$t paqthO vA EqShOddhyapa#thEnaitiq yO da#r.SapUrNamAsayAqjI sanna#mAvAqsyA$M ~MvA paurNamAqsIM ~MvA#tipAqdaya#tyaqgnimEqva pa#thiqkRutaq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa Eqvainaqmapa#thAqt panthAqmapi# nayatyanaqDvAn dakShi#NA vaqhI hyE#Sha samRu#ddhyA aqgnayE$ vraqtapa#tayE - [  ]  6
